name: Super High Ball: Pinball Platformer
description:
Super High Ball is a unique blend between a Pinball and a Precision Platformer!
Your goal is to bring the ball to the end of each level as fast as you can!



Use the flippers scattered across the level to overcome gaps, fires, timed lasers, and much more.
Manipulate the canons to project the ball, defy gravity, and use the power to slow down the ball to precisely take the quickest path to the end!



Super High Ball is difficult due to its unique gameplay, but it is fun and addictive.

Lasers, fires, holes, aiming canons, winds and traps you will have to overcome to reach the end. One single mistake, and you instantly respawn at the latest check-point!



If you are looking for more challenges and more customizations, try to complete the goals on each level.
Death limit, Time limit, or artifact collection are here to challenge your skills.

Compete against the rest of the world in the leaderboard! Only time counts! You have to go fast!
